Uses of Class
com.k2.XMLBuilder.XMLElement

    • Uses of XMLElement in com.k2.XMLBuilder

      Subclasses of XMLElement in com.k2.XMLBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  XMLDocument
      This class represents an xml document The document by default includes the xml prolog though this can be omitted if the xml builder that created the document is so configured.
